TruckAmbulance.name: Dunne Responder 3e
TruckAmbulance.description: The Responder Ambulance is efficient at transporting Critically Wounded Soldiers and carrying medical supplies.

ACGrenade.name: O'Brien v.190 Knave
ACGrenade.description: One of Conor O'Brien's best traits was his ability to modernize and make use of older technology in his designs. The v.190 Knave is the perfect example of this philosophy. Fitted with a modified, outdated twin-grenade launcher turret, the Knave is a surprising combination of speed and subterfuge that quickly routs the enemy, leaving them befuddled.
ACGrenade.ammoUsed: Tremola Grenade GPb-1, PT-815 Smoke Grenade, Green Ash Grenade, A3 Harpa Fragmentation Grenade

ACMG.name: O'Brien V.110
ACMG.description: Warden Armoured Cars are quick, well-rounded urban assault platforms. These anti-infantry vehicles are equipped with twin-barrelled machineguns.

TruckBus.name: Dunne Caravaner 2f
TruckBus.description: The Caravaner is a transport vehicle used to shuttle personnel to the front line

TankDestroyerHeavy.name: Noble Widow MK. XIV
TankDestroyerHeavy.description: This deadly tank turns predator into prey. A tank Destroyer, the Noble Widow specializes in ambush tactics, waiting for its quarry and striking with destructive high-velocity shells.

Cannoneer (Front): Equipped with a hight velocity barrel that deals 75% extra damage per shot
High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

FieldAntiTank.name: Collins Cannon 68mm
FieldAntiTank.description: The Collins Cannon is a mobile Anti-Tank field gun firing 68mm armour-piercing rounds.

Cannoneer (Right): High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

FieldCannon.name: Balfour Wolfhound
FieldCannon.description: This destructive short-ranged cannon is designed for direct engagement with enemy fortifications. The Wolfhound is fitted with reinforced shielding and a 40mm barrel.

FieldMachinegun.name: Swallowtail 988/127-2
FieldMachinegun.description: A dual barreled, high calibre anti-infantry machine gun. The Swallowtail is fitted with forward-facing armour plating and is excellent for suppression.

Gunner (Right): Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 20% extra damage per shot

FieldMortar.name: Balfour Falconer 250mm
FieldMortar.description: A heavy mobile mortar platform fitted with a thick frontal shield for assaulting fortified locations.

TruckFlatbed.name: BMS - Packmule Flatbed
TruckFlatbed.description: A heavy duty shipping transport truck designed by Basset Motor Society. It's built for hauling the heaviest of equipment over long distances with ease.

HalfTrack.name: Niska Mk. I  Gun Motor Carriage
HalfTrack.description: Designed for escort missions and to support infantry operations, the Niska Gun Motor Carriage Half-Track is an armoured, versatile all-terrain vehicle that can be equipped with a variety of mounted weapons.

ArmouredPersonnelCarrier.name: Mulloy LPC
ArmouredPersonnelCarrier.description: The Mulloy Landing Personnel Carrier is an armoured amphibious vehicle designed for carrying troops across large bodies of water to aid in coordinated beach landings and flanking assaults.

LightTank.name: Devitt Mk. III
LightTank.description: A highly maneuverable lightweight tank. Designed for urban enviroments, the Devitt is fitted with a 40mm cannon.

CruiserTankOutlaw.name: Gallagher Outlaw Mk. II
CruiserTankOutlaw.description: Originally designed in response to increasing swarms of Mesean armour, the Outlaw is an exceptionally capable medium tank armed with a long-range 40mm turred and includes a built-in storm rifle support position.

general: Engine can be boosted for increased top speed

AssaultTankSilverhand.name: Silverhand - Mk. IV
AssaultTankSilverhand.description: The Silverhand assault tank is fitted with destructive dual-barrel armaments, and heavy frontal and rear armour. Its 68mm frontal cannon is paired with a lighter 40mm turret.

Gunner (Front): High chance to penetrate armoued vehicles

Motorcycle.name: Kivela Power Wheel 80-1
Motorcycle.description: A Warden motorcycle used in patrols and fitted with a sidecar. The Kiveal Power Wheel can also gain a momentary speed boost by burning additional fuel.

general: Engine can be boosted for increased top speed

TruckFuel.name: Dunne Fuelrunner 2d
TruckFuel.description: The Fuelrunner is a heavy Dunne rig designed to transport and distribute large quantities of Fuel.

TrailerResource.name: Rooster - Junkwagon
TrailerResource.description: A simple towable trailer that holds common building resources.

ScoutTankSpire.name: King Spire Mk. I
ScoutTankSpire.description: This small tank has been recently recommissioned to the Warden arsenal. It boasts a high maneuverability and an antenna that allows for long-range communications during high-stakes recon operations.

Turret (Front): Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 36% less damage per shot

LightUtilityVehicle.name: Drummond 100a
LightUtilityVehicle.description: A multipurpose off-road Warden vehicle that can scout nearby targets.

TruckDump.name: Dunne Loadlugger 3c
TruckDump.description: This standard Truck is fitted with a resource hopper in place of the standard cargo hold. This allows for a much greater capacity for resources at the expense of space for cargo.

Truck.name: Dunne Transport
Truck.description: A heavy-duty Warden truck used to mobilize troops and supplies.

ShipBarge.name: BMS - Aquatipper
ShipBarge.description: A large shipping vessel, the Aquatipper is used to transport vehicles, equipment, and personnel over large bodies of water.

ShipFreighter.name: BMS - Ironship
ShipFreighter.description: The Basset Motor Society's Ironship-class shipping vessel is used to freight shippable goods and heavy vehicles.

ShipGunboat.name: 74b-1 Ronan Gunship
ShipGunboat.description: The 74b-1 Ronan Gunship specializes in roaming between larger vessel at high-speeds and boring into their hulls with ease. It's armed with multiple tripod mounts to suppor the midship high-explosive mortar cannon.

ConstructionVehicle.name: BMS - Universal Assembly Rig
ConstructionVehicle.description: A specialized vehicle designed by the Basset Motor Society used in the construction of large structures.

Crane.name: BMS - Class 2 Mobile Auto-Crane
Crane.description: The Basset Motor Society's Class 2 Mobile Auto-Crane is used to lift and reposition vehicles and very heavy equipment.
